show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: The Natural Nurse
content:
Host Eugene Zampieron, ND, www.drznaturally.com interviews Dr. Jared Skowron. Dr Skowron is a national expert in natural medicine for children.
Author of Fundamentals of Naturopathic Pediatrics and 100 Natural Medicines for Your Child, he teaches pediatrics at the University of Bridgeport, College of Naturopathic Medicine, where he founded the Pediatric & Autism Clinic.
 He is a Senior lecturer at the University of Bridgeport,  in Metabolic Maintenance.
 His private practice in Connecticut helps families from all over the world heal their children naturally.
He is a national lecturer and was recently seen on Animal Planet, Dogs 101.
Phone: 203-265-0018 www.NaturopathicAnswer.com YouTube: DrSkowron Twitter: drskowron
